snippet.title: The friends of Ringo Ishikawa is coming to Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
The friends of Ringo Ishikawa is a unique and immersive existential open world beat ‘em up - and it's coming to the Nintendo Switch on 4th April!

Experience the story, meet new characters and explore the town. With stylish retro-inspired visuals and a varied soundtrack to perfectly fit the mood, The friends of Ringo Ishikawa gives an awesome blend of narrative, action, varied challenges and a Japanese vibe.

Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/CIRCLE_Ent & https://twitter.com/shin_yeo
